Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in its ability to exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
